data.description:
Deprecated - this app is provided "As Is" and can be used, but there will be no further development or bugfixes.

aText is a simple text watch face with big numbers for good readability. It shows date, a simple battery meter and health data (sleep in the morning, steps after 2000 are reached).

aText features Clay offline configuration for:
- Enable / disable localization (EN, FR, DE, ES, IT, PT)
- Minimum required steps / sleep
- Step goal (watch will vibrate and count will blink on reaching the goal, setting to 0 to turn it off)
- Date format (full ISO or date and weekday)
- Enable / disable high contrast mode on wrist shake
- Text / background color
- Exception color (when required steps / sleep is not reached, or to indicate bluetooth disconnect)

On bluetooth disconnect the watch will vibrate and show a status notification instead of the pebble logo.

Shaking the watch will switch to high contrast / BW mode for 3 seconds to achieve better readability in darker environments.

This app uses the free "Antonio Bold" font, which is licensed under SIL Open Fonts license http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

I created this watchface for my personal use on a Pebble Time, and I'm sharing it in the hope that it might be useful for you, too. Use at your own risk, and if you have any bug reports or suggestions let me know, I'll see what I can do.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Pebble2 / Diorite compatibility
- Configuration switch to enable / disable high contrast mode on wrist shake

Clean, easy-to-read watchface. Shake to reveal Weather, Bluetooth status, battery meter, Pebble Health daily steps total, and current date.

- Select how often OpenWeatherMap.org weather information is updated
- Retrieve weather information using GPS or by manually entering location

- Select thin, regular or bold font width for time elements

If you're enjoying BASIC STEPS WEATHER, please click the heart above. You may also send feedback using the Support link below.

data.description:
HealthView brings Pebble Health info to your watchface.

The Watchface includes: step count, distance walked, kCal burned, sleep time, deep sleep time, weather, bluetooth status and battery status.

There's a choice of 3 weather providers and all colors are configurable.

Battery and bluetooth icons can be toggled as well as a (dis)connect vibration.

This is a 2 day free trial.
$0.99 in-app purchase afterwards.

Supports pmkey.xyz for API key storage.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug where data is not displayed in non-alternating mode.

data.title: HealthView

data.description:
The Keep It Simple watchface displays the non-abbreviated day of the week, date to include the non-abbreviated month & day number, time (in the largest system font available), and displays AM/PM for 12-hour mode.

A horizontal bar in the middle of the screen appears to be decoration. But it is actually a covert battery level indicator. As the battery depletes, the bar retracts to the left uncovering a much thinner line beneath. Others will think it's art. But only you will know it's time to recharge your watch.

Designed specifically for the Pebble and Pebble Steel.
data.title: Keep It Simple

data.description:
$1.50 / Free 3 day trial

==Overview==
Introducing Modular, the next generation watchface for Pebble! Modular was designed with a simple goal in mind: Focusing on the information that matters to you. Need to keep track of your weekly steps and sleep? Get a quick glance at the upcoming week? Anticipating an upcoming day or deadline? Look at another timezone? Check the weather? Remember your habits guilt-free? Get more organized with Modular! Make it yours!

==Features==
-Customize everything to YOUR preferences
-Clean, information dense design provides a satisfying experience!
-Custom color
-12 / 24 hour time
-US / EU date format & imperial / metric units
-BT vibration and indicator
-Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap or Weather Underground
-4 font themes: Digital, Smooth, Hybrid, Large Time
-2 progress bar options: Battery or Step Goal
-4 dividers types to help you read how far the progress bar is
-5 text information options: Date, Daily Steps, Battery, Temperature, Day of the Week
-8 modules to choose from: 
  1. Weekly Step Graph
  2. Weekly Sleep Graph
  3. Calendar
  4. Weather
  5. Alternate Timezone
  6. Countdown
  7. Note
  8. MyHabits
-Peek Mode: View 2 more modules at the flick of your wrist
-Quick View Support
-Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

-Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

==Purchase==
You have a 3 day trial to check out all the features Modular has to offer. Your one time purchase extends to all Pebble models using the same Pebble account. Payments are handled by KiezelPay.

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Modular!
data.title: Modular

data.description:
$0.99 USD

Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

CobbleStyle is back! This time with THREE modes to display the time: analog, digital or BIG TIME! With complete customization on what information you want displayed. With pre-designed color sets and complete color customization. Make CobbleStyle 2 how you want it!

Key features:

- Three Ways to display the time: Analog, digital, or BIG TIME!
- Multi-language support
- Anti-aliasing text and graphics.
- Date / Weather / Bluetooth connection.
- GPS Location.
- Week number.
- Local time.
- Alternative timezones.
- AM/PM.
- Seconds counter.
- Pre-designed color sets.
- Custom colors.
- Custom text.
- Backlight when charging option.
- Bluetooth alert options.
- THREE weather providers - choose most reliable for your location
- Master Key weather provider control via https://www.pmkey.xyz - store all your weather API keys in one convenient location

INFO ON API KEYS: http://tinyurl.com/weapi

Health Info:

- Step Count
- Live step goal bar.
- Custom step goal.
- Distance Walked
- Time Active
- Calories burned at rest
- Calories burned while active

After installing CobbleStyle 2 you will have 3 days trial to explore all the features and different aspects. At the end of the trial if you like CobbleStyle 2 and want to keep it, it's just $0.99 via KiezelPay payment system. You will be prompted to enter code and follow easy payment steps. Once purchased, the watchface is yours permanently, no matter what Pebble or phone you use, as long as you keep the same Pebble account.
data.title: CobbleStyle 2

data.author: PixelPirate

changelog.release_notes:
- Added OG support !
- Fixed a bug where evolution steps 3 and 4 could be wrong if you had the "Vibrate on evolution" option unchecked.

- Added an option to invert poop and sleep functions
- Bug fixes

- BEWARE : POOP CHANGE ! The poop no longer indicates a bluetooth deconnection but health inactivity instead. If the tama poop, that means the next evolution will be a bad one.
- Sleep : Tamawatchi now sleeps to indicate a bluetooth deconnection.
- Battery indicator : A new bar on top indicate battery level, a skull appear if below 15%
- Evolution tuning : Evolution now occurs at 25% of steps or step average, whichever happens first. It was set on steps only before, which means you sometimes didn't get the final evolution on an inactive day. On top of that, if you get the good first evolution, it will now be harder to get the next good evolution and if you get the bad first evolution, it will be easier to get the next good.

- Added vibrate and poop on Bluetooth disconnect (poop looks weird with the egg or angel but hey, you gotta do what you gotta do)
- Added secret character (or did i?)
- Added PTR support

- Bug fixes
- Step goal is no longer configurable but instead based on your day average
- A lot of colors are now configurable
- Changed egg image

data.description:
This little Tamawatchi will live and die on your wrist.

Features :
- Evolve based on your step count and step average (represented by bottom bar)
- Vibrate and sleep on Bluetooth deconnection
- Battery indicator (top bar) with a skull beside the tamawatchi if you are below 15%
- Poop if you are inactive
- Date format and vibrations configurables
- Customisable colors

Some details about evolution : 
- There are six steps : egg, evolution 1 & 2 (always the same), evolution 3 (good or bad), evolution 4 (good, average and bad, different based on previous evolution) and death.
- The two important evolutions (3 and 4) occurs at 50% and 75% of your step goal. Your step or step average can trigger it, whichever is the first to the mark.
- If the Tamawatchi poops, that means you're going to get a bad evolution. That happens if you are 10% below average.
- If you get the good evolution the first time, then the Tamawatchi will be more demanding and will poop if you are below average.
- Eggs and angels don't poop.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added OG support !
- Fixed a bug where evolution steps 3 and 4 could be wrong if you had the "Vibrate on evolution" option unchecked.

data.title: Tamawatchi

data.description:
Here, your watchface can be normal aspect, rotated left, or rotated right. Health stats are available (for pebble time series and pebble 2) include your sleep, calories (restful), distance and steps.  If Health is not available, it always displays weather description text with icon, or also your location.


Battery status can either be a graphic bar, or simple text, and digits can either be white on black or black on white. Put it in minimal mode to just display time and date. 

Original design by Chimi Kyo. 

It uses the following libraries - Flip Layer (Gregoire Sage) - Effect Layer (for the rotate 90 part - Ron64).  Originally modelled on a watchface by Yuriy Galanter (Big Flip Clock).

It also supports all native pebble app languages. Weather updates (via yahoo) half hourly. Available for all pebble watches.

data.description:
Simple watch face displays time in digital format with a fallen flower as background.
Updated version adds additional feature -> Time displayed in different colors throughout the day for Pebble Time and Round. Color changes every 3 hours during the day from 6am-9pm.
For example, 
Morning time from 6am-9am is displayed in Red
Morning work hours 9am-Noon displayed in Orange
Afternoon hours between noon-3pm displayed in Melon and so on...until cool night hours displayed in blue :)

If you like the watch face or have any ideas that can be incorporated, please email kikipebbleapps@gmail.com

Thank you!

data.description:
"WMax 2" 
Time, Weather, Calendar, Forecast, Health, Color, battery and bluetooth state + "Clay" settings:
1. Current time -12/24, custom fonts.
2. Weather  - current temperature °C/°F, temp max/min for next 24 hours, current pressure mmHg/hPa, location info, sunrise, sunset, weather icons, current temp and weather icons updates offline every 3h (from forecast data for next 24 hours)
3. Calendar for 3 weeks(current +/-1 week), weeks can start on Monday or Sunday
4. Pebble battery state
5. Pebble Health (steps counter)
6. Color
7. Blutooth state icon, vibe on connect/disconnect 
8. Second screen (on shake) with weather forecast 4 x 3 hours
9. Pebble-clay settings page

data.author: DavidCarWatch

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.0

data.description:
Shows the approximate position of the sun and moon and a few celestial features 
as if looking south. 

Sunrise and moonrise indicators not accurate in high latitudes or extreme time zones. Shows the sun, moon, celestial equator, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, SagA* and a few southern stars. A guide is available at www.davidcarwatch.com or at DavidCarWatch on Facebook.  After a two-day trial, this can be purchased for $3.95 through KiezelPay.
data.title: SunMoon

data.author: DavidCarWatch

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.0

data.description:
The minutes are in a white space that crawls around the screen filling and draining squares like sand in an hourglass. The minutes appear in about the position of the minute hand on a clock. The hour digit moves out of the way while the minutes crawl around the screen. The screen updates every three seconds. Sometimes I find it relaxing just to watch it tick.  Comments at DavidCarWatch.com or DavidCarWatch on Facebook.

After a two-day trial, this watch face can be purchased for $2.95 on KiezelPay.
data.title: MinutesSquared

data.description:
Analog watchface based on my Backwards watchface but with the hands rotating clockwise, hence the name.  

As with Backwards, the hands float away from the center and are identified by their width, length and color. 
- Hour: widest, shortest and red
- Minute: middle sized and blue
- Second: narrowest, longest and green

The center circle is a full gray circle for AM and a ring for PM.

The background can be configured to black or white and the seconds can be switched off.


Design & Programming Copyright © 2016 Nev Rawlins

data.description:
*Just in case*
There are simpler versions of this WatchFace on the appstore called, you guessed it, 'Watch It Calculate' and 'Watch It Calculate Minus.' Go ahead and check them out.

A simple yet elegant upgrade from the original 'Watch It Calculate' and 'Watch It Calculate Minus' by combining the two. Now you never have to cringe at the thought math was given a color that wasn't your own and never have to cry after realizing math has gotten comfortable with the presense/lack of the calculator background. NO MORE I SAY! Now you can customize however you see fit.

-Tells time
-Tells battery level
-Tells date
-Tells math to do your bidding
-Can change text color to your liking
-Can switch between gray calculator background and none

latest_release.release_notes: Same as Watch It Calculate, but you can switch display colors and turn the gray background on/off. Works best on Basalt and Chalk.

seconds
and settings made in CLAY
4.0 compatible

data.description:
Feel the time! 
Temperature, time, date, activity time, seconds, steps and battery status. Color indicates temperature: blue is cold and green is chilly, yellow stands for moderate while orange is for warm. Red brings the heat. New settings in CLAY. Pebble Master Key. Wunderground weather, hourly vibration, sunset mode and BT alert and status.

This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have one day trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/feelttmm  

TTMM watchfaces won Silver A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category, 2015 - 2016. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Elijah Kang and Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016

latest_release.release_notes: We replaced NIGHT MODE (no hourly vibration during sleep) with QUIET MODE. Just push left button and have a good night.

data.author: Hat

changelog.release_notes: First build, enjoy!

data.description:
*Just in case*
If you don't like the plain background for both the time and date, check out my other apps for a different build. 'Watch It Calculate', just like mama used to make. It might suit your fancy.

Do you love math? Of course you don't, but you will after using this WatchFace and watch as math does your bidding, but telling you the time of day.

Not convinced, you shouldn't be, this is math we're talking about. But just look at all those, satisfying images... Mmmmm... Tasty.....

Give it a twirl why don't you, and watch your hate for math windle as you watch it struggle to do simple addition and subtraction.

Honest description: It's a simple WatchFace for telling time, the date, and your battery level. There's also a little twist when telling time. When a minute goes by, +1 or +1 and -9, simple calculator like digital flipping, to show as if the watch is a calculator, that can tell time. Nothing fancy I suppose, but not easy to code/make. I'm sure you'd love it either way.

-Tells time
-Tells battery level
-Tells date
-Tells math to do your bidding
data.title: Watch It Calculate Minus

data.description:
This is a recreation of Victor's Watch from "Cosmos Laundromat: First Cycle". Go watch it if you haven't seen it! This watch shows hours on the left, minutes on the right, and seconds in the middle. (This watch is primarily designed to match the fictional watch, and not be 100% useful. So the colors may be hard to see and the hour and minute hands do not have directional indicators.)

Original design (CC) Blender Foundation | gooseberry.blender.org

data.description:
GREAT NEWS!! - Now Updated To Run On Pebble Watch 2!!

*Please Visit Http://DowStrong.com For Support And Donations.

*If You Enjoy TechTime 2 Please Tap The Heart - Thank You!!

TechTime 2 is finally here. I want to thank everyone for their support and emails on the original TechTime. I have made improvements and changes based on your suggestions. TechTime 2 is a Hi-Tech, Simple to read watchface that displays what matters most.

-Battery Life Improved At Least 25% Over The Original.

-Inverted Colors So That Text Becomes More Visible.

-Displays Full Day Name.

data.author: Ion Pasea
data.description: This watch face combines animation with useful information into an attractive and fun look. The information on display is time, date, battery level, but most important bluetooth lost connection indicator. This last feature is added to prevent losing the phone. When the bluetooth connection is lost, the watch will vibrate and an invalid bluetooth symbol will show. When connection is restored, the watch will vibrate again, and the invalid bluetooth symbol will be removed from the screen. Every time the minute changes, the spider will rotate three times. Every time the accelerometer is used to light up the screen, the animation will play again. When returning to the watch face after using the buttons, the animation will play as well.
data.title: Spider Watchface

data.author: Darkenvy

changelog.release_notes: Initial release of the color version with the settings page issue of the [now legacy] version fixed.

data.description:
NOTE: Must install this Japanese language pack to work! Japanese is not natively supported by Pebble. http://wh.to/pebble/index_jp.html

WaniKani on your Pebble watch! Immerse yourself not only with the time, but your most difficult words. This app takes a snapshot of your WaniKani profile every hour to provide you with the most to date vocabulary throughout your . Currently grabs any words under 70% [correct] rating.

Tells the time, Shows your title & Level Shows Kanji, Hiragana and the definition Informs you of your current review count available Updates hourly & changes words upon every change to the screen.  

Notes: If you like the Japanese language pack, show your support to the developer. He performed much more work than I did and without his effort, this watch-face would not have come to fruition. 

This project is open source over on github. Donate if you enjoyed this app on paypal at darkenvy6@gmail.com .

https://github.com/darkenvy/TokeiTokei/

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release of the color version with the settings page issue of the [now legacy] version fixed.

data.author: JL

changelog.release_notes: - Fixes
- Aligned a time bit lower on the Round
- Refresh keys
- Bugfixes

- Added option to hide status bar
- New Rain Icon
- Fixed configuration page bugs

- Now adds the option of using free keys! This will accommodate more users to use the watchface. 
- Fixed a big where negative temperature did not appear on aplite
- Explicitly  enable Fixed Location from the settings without turning off Location Services

- Made configuration more friendly
- Can now explicitly disable the weather feature

- Added a blue charging icon for white schemes 
- Improved error handling when parsing weather data 
- Made date font more readable
- Significantly reduced weather update request size (less data used per update)
- Fixed a configuration bug

- Migrate to Clay v1
- Various cosmetic fixes
- Aplite fixes
- Cosmetic changes
- Added Invert option!
- Round fixes
- Improved Icon legibility on Basalt and Chalk

-Made config instructions clearer
-Pebble Original and Steel support! 
-Added vibrate toggles on settings
Initial Release

data.description:
A beautiful and simple Digital Watchface featuring a Simple Status bar.

The Simple Status bar shows the most recent changes or update from your watch, whether it be a change in the Bluetooth connection or when the battery hits low or charged. This simplifies the watch complications by only displaying the most recent change.

Features:
- 12hr and 24hr modes based on user preference
- Weather updates every 60 minutes 
- Custom Forecast API key *
- Celsius and Fahrenheit
- Weather uses current location by default
- Optional Fixed Coordinates location when geolocation is not available
- Condition Icon shows the hourly Summary
- Vibrates on Bluetooth reconnect/disconnect
- Vibrates on New Weather Information
- Offline configuration
- Invert Color scheme

* Optional but highly recommended for reliable coverage. You can get a free API key at https://developer.forecast.io/

CREDITS:
Pebble's Clay Config Framework
Powered by Forecast.io
Icons by Freepik, Google, Weather Icons and FontAwesome!
data.title: Digital Delight

data.description:
Simple Slipknot Barcode Pebble Watchface, with time, date, battery and steps.

Lower left corner digit: step count (thousands)
Left 4-digit group: time
Right 6-digits group: date (dd MM yy)
Lower right corner: battery

This watchface is not affiliated with Slipknot, Inc. in any way.
All trademarks, logos, images are copyrighted to their respective and rightful owners.

data.description:
TTMM88

Pixel perfect retro style. Temperature, battery, date, time, seconds and steps. Settings: Temperature F or C, Date in EU or US format, black&white sunset mode, hourly vibration, BT alerts and status. 

This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have one day trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/ttmm88  

TTMM watchfaces won Silver A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category, 2015 - 2016. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Elijah Kang and Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016
data.title: TTMM88

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have one day trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/preventtmm

Short line stands for hours, long line for minutes, seconds fly away outside preventing clear reading or perhaps not. Color presets and color customization, hHourly vibration, battery status, BT disconnect alert and indicator. 

TTMM watchfaces won Silver A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category, 2015 - 2016. More original TTMM watch faces on www.now.ttmm.eu Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Wincenty Gulewicz and Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016
data.title: PREVENTTMM

data.author: Alexander Shi

changelog.release_notes:
v1.0:
Comes with such trivial features as binary representation of {minutes, hours, days, months}. Highly customizable cheater decimal time on shake (config option) and seconds binary display (config option). Background colour changes with time of day. Guaranteed to result in drastically reduced battery life while used as a watchface. What more could you ask for?

data.description: Why read time like a sensible person when you can be encumbered by binary representations on crude "IC"s? Wow. Aren't you convinced.

data.author: SchmilK

changelog.release_notes: v1.24 - Fixing text after notification again
v 1.23 - Adjustments to fix layers not drawing after notification.
Attempting to fix misdraw after notification.
1.21 -  code and resource clean up.

1.20
Added Pebble Time (Steel) support
Added ability to adjust the battery dashes value (each dash = % of battery) as well as the size of each chunk

I noticed that having 1% per chunk drained my battery a little more.  Now you can adjust to your taste.  (Each minute when updating it has to calculate the size and location of each chunk. 

Lets say the battery is at 100% with 1% chunk and 2 size, there are 100 calculations.  
Change that to 10% per chunk and 25 size then it only takes 10 calculations.
Initial release - PTR only

data.description:
The 3rd in the Schmurbery series.

This is based off a watch that I saw (from a distance) 2 people at work wearing.

Now you can customize the value and size of each battery chunk!  

*WARNING*
It's possible that more chunks  = more battery drain

Customizable colors for
-Date
-Battery shadow
-Battery
-Bluetooth connected
-Bluetooth disconnected
-Time
-Time Shadow
-Step counter

Please enjoy, more to come!

latest_release.release_notes: v1.24 - Fixing text after notification again

data.title: Schmurbery Digital 03

data.author: Steve Cicco

changelog.release_notes:
- Moved configuration page to new site
- Support for Pebble 2

data.description:
This watch face is a tribute to those affected by the tragic shootings in Orlando on June 10th and 12th.

It's also an attempt to broadcast a message that we have a real problem in America. In 2013 there were 33,169 gun-related deaths. That's roughly one every 15 minutes. This will vibrate every 15 minutes as a reminder. And not just any vibration. It will pulse 3 times in 1.25 seconds. That’s the frequency of shots used by the gun in the Pulse nightclub shootings. These weapons have no place in the hands of any civilian.

If you want to act like the NRA or many politicians and not be alerted every 15 minutes then please go to the settings page and select the “No thanks, I'll ignore the problem with America” option. We wouldn’t want to inconvenience those that only want to send their thoughts and prayers.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Moved configuration page to new site
- Support for Pebble 2

data.title: We Stand With Orlando

changelog.release_notes: Fix rendering problem with sleep ring on Pebble Time & Time Steel watches
Fix crash & improve stability on Pebble Time & Pebble Time Steel watches.
Improved performance (especially on Time & Time Steel); animated activity rings.
Initial release

data.description: Elegant analog watch with large rings for sleep time & steps walked, indicators for date, the step counter, the battery level and the Bluetooth connection status. The outer ring shows when you were asleep and when you were in deep sleep (the darker blue segments). The inner ring shows steps walked in green, delta to average in red (if you are behind), or as a yellow dot if you are ahead. Bright green for steps over your goal.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix rendering problem with sleep ring on Pebble Time & Time Steel watches

data.title: Analog Health LR

data.author: Kieselleger

changelog.release_notes: initial release

data.description: Spiral shows the minutes as an Archimedean spiral that is growing clockwise. Each turn represents 10 minutes, each minute has its own color. All colors are remixed every minute. The hour number behaves like a minute dial and is turning once an hour. This watchface look best in sunlight. The screenshots show 12:59, 12:40, 12:20 and 12:00.
data.title: Spiral
